name: VR Ski Winter Simulator
description:
VR Ski Winter Simulator
VR Skiing Winter Simulator - a game where you can feel like a skier!
Love rapid descent? I like winter sports? You do not know what to choose skis or snowboard?
Then our application will help you to decide on it!
Roll down the mountain on skis! Collect flags like a real skier and earn points!
Beat friends record, rolled off the track faster than the others!
The more points earned, the sooner buy new skis for skiing!
Change the gear to descend faster!
Discover the entire collection of skis!
Come into the world of winter sports with us!
Thank you for playing our games and applications! Leave us feedback and evaluation, and we will try to make our game more interesting!
